attributes.comment:
Please do not increase the fees!!! International adoption is already too
expensive for most
people, and this will make it even worse. Increasing these fees is wrong,
because people will pay anything to adopt, they'll take out loans, leverage
their house, anything... this is really a very underhanded way of getting more
money from us taxpayers!!! What I'm saying is that people have no alternative to
paying these fees - you really have really desperate people and you're making
their right to have a family even more of a hardship. Why don't you find another
source of money??? Like cutting some other wasteful program. This fee increase
is very disappointing and really shows the evil side of government.
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Theresa
